args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: RT @realDonaldTrump“BREAKING: Rep. Jim Banks has obtained footage of US troops under fire in the Middle East just days after Kamala Harris claimed not a single troop was in a war zone. During the debate, Harris falsely claimed there were no active-duty troops deployed in war zones.‘As of today, there is not one member of the United States military who is in active duty in a combat zone, in any war zone around the world, the first time this century,’ Harris claimed.Jim Banks says the footage below is attacks that have occurred ‘within the last couple of weeks/months.’” Via Collin Rugg
